thread.title: TrueJet Airline launches on Goibibo.com - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: TrueJet Airline launches on Goibibo.com - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
TrueJet Airline launches on Goibibo.com Published on : Monday, July 13, 2015
Trujet, the regional airline based in Hyderabad has launched on Goibibo.com, India’s leading hotels and flights booking platform. On Friday, 10th July at 11 a.m Goibibo was the first OTA in India to take TrueJet live. The first passenger booking from Goibibo happened within 60 minutes of going live.
TrueJet will start operations from 12th July in Hyderabad-Tirupthi and Hyderabad-Rajamundri routes. The airline plans to expand the same to 18 more cities covering Vijayawada, Vizag, Tirupati, Rajahmundry, Kadapa, Coimbatore, Tuticorin and Salem along with others.
Travelers on Goibibo.com can also book Flight Plus Hotel Combos with TrueJet in a single click. Prices of air tickets start at Rs.1785
Ganesh Iyer, Head of Air and Partnerships at Goibibo said “We are excited to welcome TrueJet to integrate with Goibibo.com. This launch has opened many sectors which already had a latent demand but not enough supply. We are the fastest online travel platform in India and we hope to extend our powerful technology platform and consumer demand to TrueJet”
